properties.description: data factory to access my storage container
access my key vault from azure data factory

scriptLines: License_Issue_Dt = toDate({License Issue Date}, 'MMMM dd yyyy', 'en-US'),
query: 'select NVL(MAX(BREED_SK),0) as MaxBreedSK FROM TEMP_SCHEMA.BREED_DIM',
query: 'select NVL(MAX(PET_LICENSE_SK),0) as MaxPetLICSK FROM TEMP_SCHEMA.PET_LICENSES_FACT',
